examples: We are confident in our expectation of a full recovery.
Confiamos en nuestra expectativa de una recuperación total.
We certainly had a reasonable expectation of success.
Ciertamente teníamos una expectativa razonable de éxito.
the government's expectations about the economy
las expectativas del gobierno sobre la economía
There was a general expectation that he would win.
Había una expectativa general de que ganaría.
